overview:
Bill is an energetic problem solver who enjoys the challenges associated with the development of new market or business strategies.

Since 2002, I’ve helped Early Stage and growth companies:

  • Prepare to enter new markets
  • Develop a differentiated position aligned to optimum markets
  • Develop and test effective messaging that creates interest and sales momentum
  • Engage w/ Early Adopters to test strategies and initiate qualified interests

Expertise and Specialties:

  • Company Readiness & Launch
  • Market Entry strategies developed & executed
  • Customer Messaging to improve customer interactions
  • Sales process development & improvement

Experience -

  • Company & Organizational Reasiness
  • Market Assessment, Strategy Development & Execution
  • Market entry and engagement strategies
  • Messaging to improve customer interactions
  • Early Adopter acquisition
  • Revenue Acceleration: Messaging through sales process improvement

Markets & Segments -

  • ICT: Infrastructure, Cloud, SaaS
  • Digital Media: Social media, customer sentiment
  • Food Service, Medial Device,

Hobbies and Interests:

  • Outdoors: Gardening, photography, hiking and golf.
  • Percussionist: Active trap drummer seeking to learn other percussion instruments
  • Audiophile: Audio junkie who also collects old music
  • Woodworking: Increasing my skills as time allows
  • Reading: Fiction, non-fiction
  • Fresh cook: Extracting high flavor profiles from natural foods w/out heavy sauces.

Contact Information: Bill Ezell Owner, Client Success Group, Inc bezell@Clientsuccessgroup.com 1-408-531-1907 www.clientsuccessgroup.com
